page.title: 18Transport in Caerhun Parish
page.content: There is no public transport directly serving this area. A bus service from Llandudno and Conwy to Llanrwst runs through the lower end of Rowen and along the main road near Llanbedr every two hours. Most people have their own cars, which is essential in this hilly rural area. Those without rely on the goodwill of their car-owning neighbours for lifts. There was resistance to the suggestion of having a bus service into Llanbedr village. Residents preferred to keep the village quiet and did not mind the walk to the bus stop on the road.
